channel.title: Command that gives full special attack and can't be used in wilderness?
channel.description: how do i make a command that gives u full special attack, but the command can't be used in the wilderness?

item.title: Command that gives full special attack and can't be used in wilderness?
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.source: Command that gives full special attack and can't be used in wilderness?

item.title: Command that gives full special attack and can't be used in wilderness?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Extremely simple dude, if you can do things like this I don’t see the point in starting private servers. Not being harsh at all.

You’ll need to set your special attack variable to 100 when the command is executed.

For the wilderness part, make an if statement to check if they’re in the wilderness and send them a message or something if they are. If not, set the special attack to 100.

Read full topic
item.source: Command that gives full special attack and can't be used in wilderness?
